description: Identifier of the parent report this subreport belongs to; links the subreport record to the main report definition.
System name of the subreport template used in work order printouts; typically aligns with the JasperReports subreport name or file base name.
Reference to the primary resource/template used by this subreport in the reporting engine (likely a resource table foreign key; confirm with SME).
JRXML design content defining the layout, parameters, queries, and fields for the subreport.
User who created the subreport record.
Timestamp when the subreport record was created (UTC or system time).
User who last modified the subreport record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the subreport record.
Human-readable description of the subreportâ€™s purpose within work order reporting (e.g., planned vs. actual labor, equipment, or material).
